OOC: I think I know what Lynxiz, Axis and Lokk are doing right 
now (for the first time in a long while). =P If i mess this post up, 
somebody had better tell me bout it. =)

--- Lynxiz / Axis / Lokk ---

Lynxiz growls angrily as she watches Aerotaur's leg being blown 
off. "NOBODY hurts MY friends," She yells as her disk launcher 
disappears into subspace, and both sets of claws on her hands 
extend. She launches herself into a battle craze as she rushes 
Deemos from the side slashing with her right set of claws, then her 
left at his side.

Axis, Lokk, and Seekker, who are still combined, break up into 
their bot forms. Axis charges his laser rifle, and fires twice at Train 
Wreck. Lokk's twin machine guns warm up, as he opens fire at 
Train Wreck, following Axis' lead, "Don't mess with the best, stupid 
oaf!" yells Lokk. "Windlord, you ok?"
